description.en-us: Shoot enemy ships on a grid. Repeat sequences of items using the keyboard to earn more ammo and avoid enemy fire. Small grid, abundant rewards, and short sequences for new players and quick games.

tags.en-us: 1-player, grid, audio, keyboard, sports, matching, shooting

description.en-us: Shoot enemy ships on a grid. Repeat sequences of items using the keyboard to earn more ammo and avoid enemy fire.

tags.en-us: 1-player, grid, audio, keyboard, sports, matching, shooting

description.en-us: Shoot enemy ships on a grid. Repeat sequences of items using the keyboard to earn more ammo and avoid enemy fire. Large grid, many hazards, and long sequences for advanced players and long games.

tags.en-us: 1-player, grid, audio, keyboard, sports, matching, shooting
